targets.query: SELECT MAX(mean_load1_per_core) FROM (SELECT max("load1_max")/mean("n_cpus_mean") AS mean_load1_per_core FROM "$resolution"."system" WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("used_percent_max") FROM "$resolution"."mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("used_percent_max") FROM "$resolution"."disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("used_percent_max") FROM "$resolution"."swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("usage_active_max") FROM "$resolution"."cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("usage_idle_min") * -1 + 100 FROM "$resolution"."cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("total_max") FROM "$resolution"."processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("total_threads_max") FROM "$resolution"."processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("read_bytes_per_second_max") FROM "$resolution"."custom_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("write_bytes_per_second_max") FROM "$resolution"."custom_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1_mean")/mean("n_cpus_mean") FROM "$resolution"."system" WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)
SELECT max("load1_max")/mean("n_cpus_mean") FROM "$resolution"."system" WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)

panels.title: netio (number of errors in/out per second)

targets.query: SELECT max("used_percent_max") FROM "$resolution"."disk" WHERE ("host" = '$host') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)

SELECT max("usage_iowait_max") AS "iowait", max("usage_guest_max") AS "guest", max("usage_guest_nice_max") AS "guest_nice", max("usage_irq_max") AS "irq", max("usage_nice_max") AS "nice", max("usage_softirq_max") AS "softirq", max("usage_steal_max") AS "steal", max("usage_system_max") AS "system", max("usage_user_max") AS "user" FROM "$resolution"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("blocked_mean") AS "blocked", mean("dead_mean") AS "dead", mean("idle_mean") AS "idle", mean("paging_mean") AS "paging", mean("running_mean") AS "running", mean("sleeping_mean") AS "sleeping", mean("stopped_mean") AS "stopped", mean("unknown_mean") AS "unknown", mean("zombies_mean") AS "zombies" FROM "$resolution"."processes" WHERE $timeFilter  AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: mean number of processes for $host (cumulative graph)

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_iowait_mean") AS "iowait", mean("usage_guest_mean") AS "guest", mean("usage_guest_nice_mean") AS "guest_nice", mean("usage_irq_mean") AS "irq", mean("usage_nice_mean") AS "nice", mean("usage_softirq_mean") AS "softirq", mean("usage_steal_mean") AS "steal", mean("usage_system_mean") AS "system", mean("usage_user_mean") AS "user" FROM "$resolution"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("mem_percent_mean") FROM "$resolution"."metwork_module" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "module", "plugin" fill(null)

panels.title: Mean memory usage for metwork processes (cumulated graph) for host $host

targets.query: SELECT max("mem_percent_max") FROM "$resolution"."metwork_module" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "module", "plugin" fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu_percent_mean") FROM "$resolution"."metwork_module" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "module", "plugin" fill(null)
